wikipedia_page.main: Freya Anderson  (born 4 March 2001) is a British swimmer, known primarily for her achievements as a freestyle sprinter. Anderson achieved seven gold medals and three bronze medals at the European Championships, including 5 golds and a bronze in a single meet at the 2020 European Championships in Budapest, as well as two bronze medals at the Commonwealth Games and a bronze at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships. In July 2021, she won gold as part of the British team at the 2020 Tokyo Olympics in mixed 4 × 100 metre medley relay, swimming the freestyle anchor leg in the heat.

response: * March 4 – Freya Anderson, English freestyle swimmer
